original_text: Then Joshua rose early in the morning and they set out from Shittim. And they came to the Jordan, he and all the people of Israel, and lodged there before they passed over.
korean_text: 또 여호수아가 아침에 일찍이 일어나서 그와 모든 이스라엘 자손들과 더불어 싯딤에서 떠나 요단에 이르러 건너가기 전에 거기서 유숙하니라

sentences.original_text: Then Joshua rose early in the morning
and they set out from Shittim.
And they came to the Jordan
he and all the people of Israel
